description:
Among Pipes is a classic puzzle game with remastered graphics and animations. Use your imagination and arrange the puzzle pipes and elbows to create a perfect piping connection. Don't forget to use help of our little robo mechanic! His support may be invaluable.

★ Over 300 hand made puzzles
★ Difficulty raises with game progress
★ Boosters to help you solve puzzles
★ Amazing graphics & visual effects
★ Intuitive controls and interface.
name: Among Pipes
